history.proof: intros H. destruct x, y. - hauto use: Rbar_minus_eq_0, Rmult_integral, Rbar_finite_eq, Rbar_plus_0_r unfold: Rbar_opp, real, Rbar_mult', Rbar_minus, Rbar_mult. - simpl in H. hauto lq: on depth: 3. - simpl in H. hauto lq: on depth: 3. - hauto l: on depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - hauto l: on depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros H. destruct x, y. - discriminate H. - simpl in H. apply Rbar_mult_0_r in H. auto. - simpl in H. apply Rbar_mult_0_l in H. auto. - assert (H1: Rbar_mult x y = Rbar_mult' x y). { apply is_Rbar_mult_unique. reflexivity. } rewrite H1 in H. unfold Rbar_mult in H. destruct (Rbar_mult' x y) eqn:E. + apply Rmult_integral in H. destruct H as [Hx | Hy]. * left. apply is_Rbar_mult_unique in Hx. congruence. * right. apply is_Rbar_mult_unique in Hy. congruence. + discriminate H.
